alert.note: Alert for Elmore; Tallapoosa (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 16 at 5:10PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Elmore, northwestern Macon and south central Tallapoosa Counties through 600 PM CDT... At 510 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Reeves Airport, or over Tallassee, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Tuskegee, Tallassee, Notasulga, Milstead, Eclectic, Shorter, Franklin, Liverpool, Liberty City, Reeves Airport, Tallapoosa City, Tysonville, Victoryland, Yates Dam, Ware and Yates Reservoir. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
